name: 10th World Congress on Applied Science Engineering and Technology
content: The 10th World Congress on Applied Science Engineering and Technology presents an unprecedented opportunity to meet and network with leading engineers, scientist, academician and professionals from around the world and listen to top speakers on new developments that will impact and advance the future of science, engineering and technology. WCASET practitioner-focused Congress will consolidate the endeavors made throughout world to advance the field of engineering and technology through speakers and contributors who are acknowledged world leaders in their area of specialization.
topics: computer graphics, animation, virtual reality & gaming
